column4: I've been having this problem for a long time now But in short, there's not a single distro of linux that will boot with my graphics card enabled.
It's an NVidia GeForce FX 5200, so it's quite old
but it's what I have, and I'd like it to work. It's PCI.
A friend told me that Ubuntu 9.04 fixed a problem with a similar card of hers, so I decided to give it a shot.
no problems here with same card and nvidia 173 driver
My PC has an onboard intel chipset that's conflicting with it.
